channel.title: How can I transfer the installed MODs from one PC to another PC
channel.description:
Hello :slight_smile:
Please how can I transfer the installed MODs from one PC to another PC to using the same saved game on the new PC?
Thanks in advance and regards :sunglasses::vulcan_salute:

item.title: How can I transfer the installed MODs from one PC to another PC
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

just install the same mods and it works
(there is a mod profile export button in the cog to, so you can export and import a mod profile)

Read full topic
item.source: How can I transfer the installed MODs from one PC to another PC
